generated_description: golden life american hospital is a medical facility located in bamako, mali. the hospital offers a wide range of medical services including cardiology, dentistry, emergency care, ent, gastroenterology, general surgery, internal medicine, neurosurgery, obstetric gynecology, ophthalmology, orthopedics and traumatology, pediatrics, radiology, and urology. it features an intensive care unit with 23 beds and a capacity of 80 beds in total. the hospital is equipped with high-tech medical equipment and aims to provide comprehensive patient care, including health screenings and various check-up packages. golden life american hospital is recognized for its expertise and is consistently ranked among the top hospitals in mali.
